content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_text_separator title=”Web Applications”][vc_column_text]

OSI possesses the technical ability, resources, experience and proven track record in assisting customers through the complete software development life cycle of web applications for both intranet and internet solutions.

Our processes are tailored to meet the unique technical and operational challenges of complex web applications. We manage all aspects of system engineering, software requirements, design and development, system deployment and sustainment.

How do we achieve the success in our projects that we do?

By doing the following:
• Agile Development (Web and Mobile)
• Automated testing, Regression, Performance Testing and QA Testing.
• Customer Centric User Story Collaboration
• DevOps
• User Training
• Metrics Collection and Reporting
• Cyber Security

[/vc_column_text][vc_text_separator title=”OSI Expertise”][vc_column_text]

• Custom Web Applications
• Ecommerce Development
• Responsive Website Development
• CMS Website Development
• Social Networking Site Development
• Web services & APIs
• Accessibility & 508 Compliance
• Business Intelligence & Analytics

Technology Stack

Visual Studio, MVC, Java, Bootstrap HTML5, CSS3, Angular.js, Node.js, JQuery, GitHub, TeamCity, Octopus Deploy, JIRA and Slack[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
